statements: SELECT * FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE region_name = 'North America'
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE temperature > 30
SELECT image_id, image_name, region_name FROM heatmap_satellite_images ORDER BY region_name ASC
SELECT * FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE temperature < 0 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT COUNT(image_id) AS total_images FROM heatmap_satellite_images
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_url FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE region_name = 'Europe'
SELECT image_name, temperature FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE ST_Intersects(coordinates, ST_MakePoint(-122.3, 47.6))
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM heatmap_satellite_images ORDER BY region_name
SELECT * FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE region_name = 'Asia' AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 35
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT id, image_url, region_name FROM satellite_images;
SELECT temperature, image_url FROM satellite_images ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_readings WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -50;
SELECT image_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_readings WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE region_name = 'North America';
SELECT image_url, temperature FROM satellite_images WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT image_id, latitude, longitude FROM temperature_readings WHERE latitude BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -100 AND -80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_readings WHERE temperature > 25 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM temperature_readings GROUP BY image_id HAVING MAX(temperature) > 35;
SELECT image_id, temperature FROM heat_maps WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_id, AVG(temperature_reading) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY region_id;
SELECT image_id FROM heat_maps WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT region_id, COUNT(*) AS num_data_points FROM temperature_data GROUP BY region_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM heat_maps WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, region_id, temperature FROM heat_maps INNER JOIN temperature_data ON heat_maps.image_id = temperature_data.image_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND region_id = 3;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY region_id ASC;
SELECT image_id, temperature FROM heat_maps WHERE image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM temperature_data GROUP BY image_id HAVING MAX(temperature_reading) > 35);

SELECT image_id, temperature FROM heat_maps INNER JOIN temperature_data ON heat_maps.image_id = temperature_data.image_id GROUP BY image_id HAVING SUM(temperature_reading) > 100 ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Data LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite_id, longitude, latitude, temperature FROM Temperature_Data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM Regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM Satellite_Images WHERE capture_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT heat_map_id, heat_image_url FROM Heat_Map WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Data ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT latitude, longitude, temperature FROM Temperature_Data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT Satellite_Images.* FROM Satellite_Images JOIN Heat_Map ON Satellite_Images.satellite_id = Heat_Map.satellite_id WHERE Heat_Map.region_id = 1;

SELECT Temperature_Data.latitude, Temperature_Data.longitude, Regions.region_name FROM Temperature_Data JOIN Heat_Map ON Temperature_Data.satellite_id = Heat_Map.satellite_id JOIN Regions ON Heat_Map.region_id = Regions.region_id;

SELECT Heat_Map.heat_map_id, Heat_Map.satellite_id, Satellite_Images.image_url FROM Heat_Map JOIN Satellite_Images ON Heat_Map.satellite_id = Satellite_Images.satellite_id WHERE Heat_Map.region_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_id, image_data FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_id = 10;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM ImageMetadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM Regions WHERE region_name LIKE '%North%';
SELECT temperature_id, temperature FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, location FROM SatelliteImages JOIN ImageMetadata ON SatelliteImages.image_id = ImageMetadata.image_id WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, temperature FROM SatelliteImages JOIN TemperatureData ON SatelliteImages.image_id = TemperatureData.image_id WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT region_name, heat_intensity FROM Regions JOIN HeatMap ON Regions.region_id = HeatMap.region_id ORDER BY heat_intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM HeatMap JOIN SatelliteImages ON HeatMap.image_id = SatelliteImages.image_id WHERE region_id = 1 AND TIMESTAMP(image_data) BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
